steps.goal: Search for the group 'Work Updates' using the search bar. Open it. Use read_screen to collect the last 10 messages. Copy all the text to clipboard using clipboard_set.

Use compose_email to send an email. Set the query (email address) to 'myself@gmail.com'. Set the text to 'WhatsApp Work Updates Summary - forwarded from group chat' followed by the clipboard contents. The compose_email action will open the email app with the To field pre-filled.
